title: The White Helmets
creator_credit: Grain Media, Violet Films, Orlando von Einsiedel and Joanna Natasegara
headline_credit: Syrian Arab Republic and United Kingdom, 2016
brief_description: As daily airstrikes pound civilian targets in Syria, a group of indomitable first responders risk their lives to rescue victims from the rubble.

constellations_other.name: Cities under siege
constellations_other.description: The Syrian Civil War is an ongoing conflict that is arguably the most documented in history, with images and videos captured by journalists, activists, combatants and victims.

creator_credit_for_label: Grain Media, Violet Films, Orlando von Einsiedel and Joanna Natasegara
description: As daily airstrikes pound civilian targets in Syria, a group of indomitable first responders risk their lives to rescue victims from the rubble.
